name: Cocktail Marketing
description:
Cocktail Marketing is the UK's leading brand partnership and loyalty marketing agency specializing in quid pro quo, no money changes hands, brand led marketing partnerships. Our marketing partnerships offer media for media brand partnerships with free offers, incentives or prizes given by each side to the other's customers with no money changing hands.
We passionately believe that brand partnerships can achieve any marketing objective and we have innumerable case studies to prove it.
READ MORE...
